task: Develop a basic 'Centipede' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Remove specifics and convert to ambiguities'.
name: Blurred Swarm

branding_data.short_description: A reimagined version of the classic 'Centipede' with abstract elements and unpredictable gameplay.
branding_data.detailed_description: Blurred Swarm takes the beloved 'Centipede' arcade game and transforms it into an abstract experience where specifics are stripped away, leaving players to navigate a world of ambiguities. The centipede is no longer a defined creature but a shifting, flowing entity that changes form and behavior. Players must adapt to its unpredictable movements and appearances, relying on intuition and quick reflexes. The environment is a kaleidoscope of abstract shapes and colors, creating an immersive atmosphere that challenges perception and strategy. Every playthrough is unique, offering endless possibilities and keeping players on their toes as they attempt to decipher and conquer the enigmatic swarm.

errors: Expecting property name enclosed in double quotes: line 1 column 2 (char 1)
strategy: Remove specifics and convert to ambiguities
